original_english: If you have a weakened immune system due to AIDS, cancer, transplantation, or corticosteroid use, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or shortness of breath.
translated_spanish: Si su sistema inmunitario está debilitado debido al SIDA, el cáncer, una trasplante o el uso de corticosteroides, llame a su médico si desarrolla tos, fiebre u dificultad para respirar.
back_translated_english: If your immune system is weakened due to AIDS, cancer, an organ transplant, or the use of corticosteroids, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or difficulty breathing.

original_english: Do NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected or if it makes the victim uncomfortable.
translated_spanish: NO coloque a la persona en esta posición si se sospecha una lesión en la cabeza, el cuello, la espalda o las piernas, o si esto incomoda a la víctima.
back_translated_english: DO NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected, or if it causes discomfort to the victim.

original_english: Increased vision allows the infant to tell objects apart from backgrounds with very little contrast (such as a button on a blouse of the same color)
translated_spanish: Una visión mejorada le permite al bebé distinguir objetos de sus fondos, incluso cuando la diferencia de contraste es mínima (como un botón en una blusa del mismo color).
back_translated_english: Improved vision allows the infant to distinguish objects from their backgrounds, even when the contrast difference is minimal (such as a button on a blouse of the same color).

original_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.
translated_spanish: Si la obesidad le impide estar físicamente en condiciones de inspeccionar sus pies, pida a un familiar, vecino o enfermera visitante que realice este importante chequeo.
back_translated_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.

original_english: CT scan or MRI to confirm that there is a growth, and to see if the cancer has spread to lymph nodes in the neck
translated_spanish: TC o RM para confirmar la presencia de un crecimiento y ver si el cáncer se ha propagado a los ganglios linfáticos del cuello
back_translated_english: CT or MRI to confirm the presence of a growth and see if the cancer has spread to the lymph nodes in the neck

original_english: A uniform brown color is usually seen over the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip.It is most often symmetrical (matching on both sides of the face).
translated_spanish: Se ve generalmente un color marrón uniforme en las mejillas, frente, nariz u labio superior. Es lo más frecuente que sea simétrico (igual en ambos lados del rostro).
back_translated_english: A uniform brown color is usually seen on the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip. It is most commonly symmetrical (equal on both sides of the face).

original_english: Your doctor may do other tests to check high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes of, and risk factors for TIAs or stroke.
translated_spanish: Su médico puede realizar otros exámenes para verificar la hipertensión arterial, enfermedades cardiacas, diabetes, colesterol alto y otras causas y factores de riesgo de AITs o accidente cerebrovascular.
back_translated_english: Your doctor may perform other tests to verify hypertension, heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes and risk factors for strokes or cerebrovascular accidents.

original_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical breathing sound caused by a blockage in the throat or voice box (larynx).It is usually heard when taking in a breath.
translated_spanish: El silbido es un ruido respiratorio anormal, agudo y musical, causado por una obstrucción en la garganta o en la glotis (laringe). Generalmente se escucha al inhalar.
back_translated_english: The wheeze is an abnormal breath sound, sharp and musical, caused by an obstruction in the throat or glottis (larynx). It is usually heard during inhalation.

original_english: Is there blood on the toilet paper only?
translated_spanish: ¿Hay sangre solo en el papel higiénico?
back_translated_english: Is there blood only on the toilet paper?

original_english: Ask your health care provider.
translated_spanish: Consulte a su médico.
back_translated_english: Talk to your doctor.

original_english: Complete bed rest for several days is usually recommended.
translated_spanish: El reposo total en cama durante varios días generalmente se recomienda.
back_translated_english: Complete bed rest for several days is generally recommended.

original_english: They still have foot problems after treatment
translated_spanish: Tienen problemas en el pie después del tratamiento
back_translated_english: They have problems in the foot after treatment

original_english: Disorders of the endocrine system
translated_spanish: Trastornos del sistema endocrino
back_translated_english: Endocrine system disorders

original_english: Biopsy - breast; Open breast biopsy
translated_spanish: Biopsia de mama; Biopsia abierta de mama
back_translated_english: Breast biopsy; Open breast biopsy

original_english: Are illegal drugs being used?
translated_spanish: ¿Se están utilizando drogas ilícitas?
back_translated_english: Are illicit drugs being used?

original_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.
translated_spanish: Las medidas preventivas varían en función del trastorno específico.
back_translated_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.

original_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or may test different specimens.
translated_spanish: Algunos laboratorios usan diferentes medidas o pueden evaluar distintas muestras.
back_translated_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or may test different samples.

original_english: Menopause. A drop in the hormone estrogen causes vaginal dryness.
translated_spanish: Menopausia. Una disminución en la hormona estrógeno causa sequedad vaginal.
back_translated_english: Menopause. A decrease in the estrogen hormone causes vaginal dryness.

original_english: Depression and older age are both risk factors for suicide.
translated_spanish: La depresión y la edad avanzada son ambos factores de riesgo para el suicidio.
back_translated_english: Depression and advanced age are both risk factors for suicide.

original_english: Most women have only one polyp, but some women have two or three.
translated_spanish: La mayoría de las mujeres tienen solo un pólipo, pero algunas tienen dos o tres.
back_translated_english: Most women have only one polyp, but some have two or three.

original_english: This test is done to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.
translated_spanish: Se realiza este examen para medir el nivel de ácidos aminoácidos en la sangre.
back_translated_english: This test is performed to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.

original_english: The infection is spread by saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.
translated_spanish: La infección se propaga a través de la saliva, orina, gotas respiratorias, contacto sexual y transfusiones de sangre.
back_translated_english: The infection spreads through saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.

original_english: You may occasionally eat lean, 3-ounce cuts of red meat.
translated_spanish: Puede comer ocasionalmente cortes magros de carne roja de 3 onzas.
back_translated_english: You can occasionally eat 3-ounce portions of lean cuts of red meat.

original_english: Several conditions may cause increased pressure in the skull, including:
translated_spanish: Varios trastornos pueden causar una presión aumentada en el cráneo, incluyendo:
back_translated_english: Several disorders can cause increased pressure in the skull, including:

original_english: Abnormal heart sounds
translated_spanish: Sonidos cardiacos anormales
back_translated_english: Abnormal heart sounds

original_english: Waxy, yellow surface
translated_spanish: Superficie cerosa y amarilla
back_translated_english: Waxy yellow surface

original_english: Oxygen
translated_spanish: Oxígeno
back_translated_english: Oxygen

original_english: Recent open heart surgery
translated_spanish: Cirugía cardiaca abierta reciente
back_translated_english: Recent open heart surgery

original_english: Thyroid disease
translated_spanish: Enfermedad tiroidea
back_translated_english: Thyroid disease

original_english: Nausea
translated_spanish: Náuseas
back_translated_english: Nausea

original_english: Brussels sproutsCabbage
translated_spanish: Coliflor Repollo
back_translated_english: Cauliflower Cabbage

original_english: Oysters
translated_spanish: Almejas
back_translated_english: Clams

original_english: CPR can be lifesaving, but it is best done by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.
translated_spanish: La RCP (reanimación cardiopulmonar) puede salvar vidas, pero lo mejor es que sea realizada por alguien entrenado en un curso de RCP acreditado.
back_translated_english: CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) can save lives, but it is best when performed by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.

original_english: Always let your doctor know about any cold, flu, fever, herpes breakout, or other illnesses you may have.
translated_spanish: Siempre hágale saber a su médico sobre cualquier resfriado, gripe, fiebre, brote de herpes u otras enfermedades que pueda tener.
back_translated_english: Always let your doctor know about any colds, flu, fever, herpes outbreak, or other illnesses you may have.

original_english: Tretinoin (Retin-A) or creams containing alpha-hydroxy acids may be recommended, but these aren't guaranteed to help.
translated_spanish: Se puede recomendar tretinoína (Retin-A) o cremas que contengan ácidos alfa-hidroxilo, pero no están garantizadas para ayudar.
back_translated_english: Tretinoin (Retin-A) or creams containing alpha-hydroxy acids may be recommended, but they are not guaranteed to help.

original_english: Fever is the classic symptom and may persist for days before any other symptoms appear.
translated_spanish: La fiebre es el síntoma clásico y puede persistir durante días antes de que aparezcan otros síntomas.
back_translated_english: Fever is the classic symptom and may persist for days before other symptoms appear.

original_english: There is more likely to be increased amounts of pollen in the air on hot, dry, windy days.
translated_spanish: Es más probable que haya mayores cantidades de polen en el aire en días calurosos, secos y ventosos.
back_translated_english: There are likely to be higher quantities of pollen in the air on hot, dry, and windy days.

original_english: You get iron through certain foods, and your body also reuses iron from old red blood cells.
translated_spanish: Obtiene hierro a través de ciertos alimentos y su cuerpo también recicla el hierro de los glóbulos rojos viejos.
back_translated_english: You obtain iron through certain foods, and your body also recycles the iron from old red blood cells.

original_english: Asthma symptoms usually occur much less often or disappear as the child gets get older.
translated_spanish: Los síntomas de la enfermedad bronquial infantil suelen ocurrir mucho menos frecuentemente o desaparecen a medida que el niño envejece.
back_translated_english: The symptoms of childhood bronchial disease usually occur much less frequently or disappear as the child grows older.

original_english: Potatoes that are not green and have had any sprouts removed are safe to eat.
translated_spanish: Las papas que no sean verdes y de las cuales se hayan eliminado los brotes son seguras para consumir.
back_translated_english: Potatoes that are not green and from which sprouts have been removed are safe to consume.

original_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain, or only a prick or stinging sensation.
translated_spanish: Cuando se introduce la aguja para extraer la sangre, puede sentir un dolor moderado o sólo un pinchazo o sensación de picadura.
back_translated_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain or only a prick or stinging sensation.

original_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies for an individual, it can continue to affect the person long term.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, como regla general, una vez que una sustancia causa alergias en un individuo, puede seguir afectando a la persona a largo plazo.
back_translated_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies in an individual, it may continue to affect the person over the long term.

original_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will likely increase but it will not improve your chances of getting a woman pregnant.
translated_spanish: Si tiene cirugía, su conteo de espermatozoides probablemente aumentará, pero no mejorará sus posibilidades de embarazar a una mujer.
back_translated_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will probably increase, but it will not improve your chances of impregnating a woman.

original_english: Screening women with pelvic ultrasound or blood tests, such as the Ca-125 has not been found to be effective and is not recommended.
translated_spanish: La exploración con ecografía pélvica o pruebas de sangre, como la CA-125, no se ha encontrado efectiva y no se recomienda para las mujeres.
back_translated_english: Pelvic ultrasound examination or blood tests, such as the CA-125 test, have not been found to be effective and are not recommended for women.

original_english: Protein can also be used by the body for energy, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate stores have been used up.
translated_spanish: La proteína también puede ser utilizada por el cuerpo como fuente de energía, pero solo después de que se hayan agotado las reservas de glucógeno o carbohidratos.
back_translated_english: Protein can also be used by the body as an energy source, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate reserves have been depleted.

original_english: An extradural hemorrhage is bleeding between the inside of the skull and the outer covering of the brain (called the "dura").
translated_spanish: Una hemorragia extradural es el sangrado entre el interior del cráneo y la cubierta externa del cerebro (llamada 'dura').
back_translated_english: An extradural hemorrhage is bleeding between the inner skull and the outer covering of the brain (called the 'dura').

original_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot connect to the cell surface and protect the cell from substances in the blood called complement.
translated_spanish: Sin PIG-A, las proteínas importantes no pueden unirse a la superficie celular y protegerla de sustancias en la sangre llamadas complemento.
back_translated_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot attach to the cell surface and protect it from substances in the blood called complement.

original_english: If you can see bone in the injured site, call your local emergency number (such as 911) or local hospital for further advice.
translated_spanish: Si puede ver hueso en el sitio lesionado, llame al número local de emergencias (como el 911) o al hospital local para obtener recomendaciones adicionales.
back_translated_english: If you can see bone at the injured site, call your local emergency number (such as 911) or contact your local hospital for further advice.

original_english: Bladder distention (urinary bladder over-filled with fluid) can cause a firm mass in the center of the lower abdomen above the pelvic bones.In extreme cases it can reach as far up as the navel.
translated_spanish: La distensión vesical (vesícula urinaria sobrecargada de líquido) puede causar una masa firme en el centro de la parte inferior del abdomen, por encima de los huesos pélvicos. En casos extremos, puede llegar hasta la altura del ombligo.
back_translated_english: Bladder distension (an overfilled urinary bladder with fluid) can cause a firm mass in the center of the lower abdomen, above the pelvic bones. In extreme cases, it may extend up to the level of the navel.

original_english: Your kidneys help control your body's acid level by removing acid from the blood and sending it into your urine.Acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.
translated_spanish: Sus riñones ayudan a controlar el nivel de acidez del cuerpo al eliminar ácidos de la sangre y enviarlos en su orina. Las sustancias ácidas en el cuerpo se contrarrestan con sustancias alcalinas, principalmente bicarbonato.
back_translated_english: Your kidneys help control the level of acidity in your body by removing acids from your blood and excreting them in your urine. Acidic substances in your body are balanced out by alkaline substances, mainly bicarbonate.

original_english: You'll likely be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and have signs that you've had a previous strep infection.
translated_spanish: Se te diagnosticará de fiebre reumática si cumples con dos criterios principales, o uno principal y dos menores, y presentas signos de que has tenido una infección previa por estreptococo.
back_translated_english: You will be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and show signs that you have had a previous streptococcal infection.

original_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest between the ribs and into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium).A small amount of fluid is taken out.
translated_spanish: Un médico entrenado, con frecuencia un cardiólogo, introduce una pequeña aguja en el tórax entre las costillas hasta el saco delgado que rodea el corazón (el pericardio). Se extrae una cantidad pequeña de líquido.
back_translated_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest between the ribs into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium). A small amount of fluid is removed.

original_english: Increased calcium for a limited period of time does not normally cause side effects.However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over a long period of time raises the risk of kidney stones in some people.
translated_spanish: Un aumento de calcio por un período limitado no causa generalmente efectos secundarios. Sin embargo, recibir cantidades más altas de calcio durante un largo período de tiempo aumenta el riesgo de formación de cálculos en los riñones en algunas personas.
back_translated_english: An increase in calcium for a limited period generally does not cause secondary effects. However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over an extended period increases the risk of kidney stone formation in some people.

original_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to have psychological and social problems.Children and adolescents generally want to be the same as their peers, and early sexual development can make them appear different.
translated_spanish: Los niños con desarrollo sexual temprano son más propensos a tener problemas psicológicos y sociales. Los niños y adolescentes generalmente desean ser iguales a sus compañeros, y el desarrollo sexual temprano puede hacer que parezcan diferentes.
back_translated_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to have psychological and social problems. Children and adolescents generally want to be like their peers, and early sexual development can make them seem different.

original_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other.Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.
translated_spanish: Las venas y las arterias varían en tamaño de un paciente a otro y de un lado del cuerpo al otro. Obtener una muestra de sangre de algunas personas puede ser más difícil que de otras.
back_translated_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other. Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.

original_english: In many cases it will prevent you from getting sick.For example, a person who has had chickenpox or has been immunized against chickenpox is immune from getting chickenpox again.Watch this video about:Immune response
translated_spanish: En muchos casos, esto le impedirá enfermarse. Por ejemplo, una persona que ha tenido varicela o se ha vacunado contra la varicela está inmunizada y no volverá a contraerla. Consulte este video sobre: Respuesta inmunitaria
back_translated_english: In many cases, this will prevent you from getting sick. For example, a person who has had chickenpox or has been vaccinated against it is immune and will not contract it again. Watch this video about: Immune response

original_english: For example, a food that has 13 grams of fat with a Percent Daily Value of 20% means that 13 grams of fat is 20%, or one-fifth, of the total daily fat recommended for a person who eats 2,000 calories per day.
translated_spanish: Por ejemplo, un alimento que tenga 13 gramos de grasa con un Valor Percentual Diario del 20% significa que 13 gramos de grasa es el 20%, o una quinta parte, del total de la cantidad diaria recomendada de grasa para una persona que consume 2,000 calorías al día.
back_translated_english: For example, a food that contains 13 grams of fat with a Daily Value of 20% means that 13 grams of fat is the 20%, or one-fifth, of the total daily recommended amount of fat for a person who consumes 2,000 calories per day.

original_english: Laparoscopic repair: Your surgeon will make 3 - 5 small cuts in your belly.Your surgeon will insert a laparoscope (a thin, hollow tube with a tiny camera on the end) through one of these cuts and other tools through the other cuts.
translated_spanish: Reparación laparoscópica: El cirujano hará 3 a 5 pequeñas incisiones en el abdomen. A través de una de estas incisiones, el cirujano introducirá un laparoscopio (un tubo delgado y hueco con una pequeña cámara en la punta) y otros instrumentos quirúrgicos a través de las otras incisiones.
back_translated_english: Laparoscopic repair: The surgeon will make 3 to 5 small cuts in the abdomen. Through one of these cuts, the surgeon will insert a laparoscope (a thin tube with a tiny camera on the end) and other surgical instruments through the other incisions.

original_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea, and suggest that these medications can be used in children with tics who also have attention-deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children).A chronic motor tic disorder also exists.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, estudios recientes no respaldan esta idea y sugieren que estos medicamentos pueden usarse en niños con tics que también tienen trastorno por déficit de atención (que a menudo ocurre en el mismo grupo de niños). También existe un trastorno crónico de tic motriz.
back_translated_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea and suggest that these medications can be used in children with tics who also have attention deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children). There is also a chronic motor tic disorder.

original_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed because this gives the MRSA germ a way to “get in.” Symptoms are also more likely in areas where there is more body hair due to hair follicles.
translated_spanish: Estos síntomas son más probables si la piel ha sido cortada o frotada, ya que esto proporciona una vía para que el germen de MRSA entre. También es más probable que aparezcan en áreas con mayor cantidad de pelo corporal debido a los folículos pilosos.
back_translated_english: These symptoms are more likely if the skin has been cut or rubbed, as this provides an entry point for MRSA bacteria. They also tend to appear in areas with more body hair due to hair follicles.

original_english: Some patients develop heart failure and high blood pressure in the blood vessels of their lungs.Your chances of recovering or of the disease getting worse depend on the cause and how severe the disease was when it was first diagnosed.
translated_spanish: Algunos pacientes desarrollan insuficiencia cardíaca y hipertensión en los vasos sanguíneos de sus pulmones. Sus posibilidades de recuperación o empeoramiento del estado dependen de la causa y de cuán grave era la enfermedad al momento del diagnóstico inicial.
back_translated_english: Some patients develop heart failure and high blood pressure in the blood vessels of their lungs. Their chances of recovery or worsening depend on the cause and how severe the disease was at the time of initial diagnosis.

original_english: If a young child refuses to put weight on an arm or leg after an accident, won't move the arm or leg, or you can clearly see a deformity, assume the child has a broken bone and get medical help.
translated_spanish: Si un niño pequeño se niega a poner peso sobre un brazo o una pierna después de un accidente, no mueve el brazo o la pierna, o si puede verse claramente una deformidad, suponga que tiene un hueso roto y busque ayuda médica.
back_translated_english: If a young child refuses to put weight on an arm or leg after an accident, does not move the arm or leg, or if a deformity is clearly visible, assume that there is a broken bone and seek medical help.

original_english: The amount of liquid you eat (such as soup) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce.You will be told what you may and may not eat to reduce the buildup of toxins that the kidneys would normally remove.
translated_spanish: La cantidad de líquidos que ingiere (como sopas) o bebe se limitará a la cantidad de orina que pueda producir. Se le indicará qué puede y no puede comer para reducir la acumulación de toxinas que los riñones normalmente eliminarían.
back_translated_english: The amount of liquids you consume (such as soups) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce. You will be told what you can and cannot eat in order to reduce the buildup of toxins that your kidneys would normally eliminate.

original_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a disorder called sarcoidosis . People with sarcoidosis may have their ACE levels tested regularly to check the severity of the disease and see how well treatment is working.
translated_spanish: El uso más común de esta prueba es ayudar a diagnosticar y monitorear un trastorno llamado sarcoidosis. Las personas con sarcoidosis pueden someterse regularmente a pruebas de niveles de ACE para evaluar la gravedad de la enfermedad y ver cómo está funcionando el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a condition called sarcoidosis. People with sarcoidosis may undergo regular ACE level tests to assess the severity of the disease and see how well the treatment is working.

original_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear layer of tissue lining the eyelids and covering the white of the eye (conjunctiva) become swollen or inflamed due to a reaction to pollen, dander, mold, or other allergy-causing substances.
translated_spanish: La conjuntivitis alérgica ocurre cuando la capa clara de tejido que recubre los párpados y cubre el blanco del ojo (conjuntiva) se inflama o enrojece como resultado de una reacción a polen, escamas de piel de animales, moho u otras sustancias causantes de alergias.
back_translated_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear tissue that covers the whites of the eye and lines the inner part of the eyelids (conjunctiva) becomes inflamed or reddened as a result of a reaction to pollen, animal dander, mold, or other allergens.

original_english: Advance care directives allow patients to provide instructions about their preferences regarding the care they would like to receive if they develop an illness or a life-threatening injury and are unable to express their preferences.
translated_spanish: Las directrices de atención anticipada permiten a los pacientes proporcionar instrucciones sobre sus preferencias en cuanto al cuidado que desean recibir si desarrollan una enfermedad o una lesión grave y no pueden expresar sus preferencias.
back_translated_english: Advance directives allow patients to provide instructions about their preferences regarding the care they wish to receive if they develop a serious illness or injury and are unable to express their preferences.

original_english: People with this condition generally have a large left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies the body with blood), and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies the lungs with blood).
translated_spanish: Las personas con esta condición suelen tener un ventrículo izquierdo grande (la cámara de bombeo del corazón que suministra sangre al cuerpo) y un ventrículo derecho pequeño (la cámara de bombeo que suministra sangre a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: People with this condition typically have a large left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies blood to the body) and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies blood to the lungs).

original_english: In January 2001, the FDA's Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition proposed that developers of bioengineered food submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.
translated_spanish: En enero de 2001, el Centro para la Seguridad Alimentaria y Nutrición Aplicada (CFSAN) de la Administración de Drogas y Alimentos (FDA) propuso que los desarrolladores de alimentos bioingenierizados presenten información científica y de seguridad a la FDA por lo menos 120 días antes de que el alimento sea comercializado.
back_translated_english: In January 2001, the Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition (CFSAN) of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) proposed that developers of bioengineered foods submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.

original_english: Your health care provider will tell you if it's necessary to stop taking any drugs that may interfere with this test.Make sure that your doctor is aware of all drugs you are taking, both prescription and nonprescription.
translated_spanish: El proveedor de atención médica le informará si es necesario dejar de tomar ciertos medicamentos que puedan interferir con este examen. Asegúrese de que su médico esté al tanto de todos los fármacos que está tomando, ya sean recetados o no recetados.
back_translated_english: Your healthcare provider will inform you if it is necessary to stop taking certain medications that may interfere with this test. Make sure your doctor is aware of all the drugs you are taking, whether prescribed or over-the-counter.

original_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked greens, and canned salmon (with bones) will also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult to get children to consume adequate quantities of these foods.
translated_spanish: Otros alimentos como el brócoli, las hojas verdes cocidas y el salmón enlatado (con huesos) también proporcionarán una fuente de calcio en la dieta; sin embargo, a menudo resulta difícil que los niños consuman cantidades adecuadas de estos alimentos.
back_translated_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked green leafy vegetables, and canned salmon (with bones) also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult for children to consume adequate amounts of these foods.

original_english: Transposition of the great vessels is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital). The two major vessels that carry blood away from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).
translated_spanish: La transposición de los grandes vasos es un defecto cardíaco que ocurre desde el nacimiento (cardiopatía congénita). Los dos principales vasos sanguíneos que llevan sangre lejos del corazón -- la aorta y la arteria pulmonar -- están intercambiados (transpuestos).
back_translated_english: Great vessel transposition is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital heart disease). The two main blood vessels that carry blood away from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).

original_english: Your health care provider will examine you for signs of food poisoning, such as pain in the stomach and signs your body does not have as much water and fluids as it should.This is called dehydration.
translated_spanish: El médico lo examinará en busca de signos de intoxicación alimentaria, como el dolor estomacal y los signos de que su cuerpo no tiene la cantidad adecuada de agua y líquidos. A esto se le llama deshidratación.
back_translated_english: The doctor will examine you for signs of food poisoning, such as stomach pain and signs that your body does not have enough water and fluids. This is called dehydration.

original_english: An implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of people who are at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by quickly sending an electrical shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.
translated_spanish: Un desfibrilador cardioinversor implantable (DCI) es un dispositivo que se puede implantar en el muro torácico de personas que corren riesgo para este trastorno grave del ritmo. El DCI puede ayudar a prevenir la muerte súbita cardíaca enviando rápidamente un choque eléctrico cuando ocurre una fibrilación ventricular.
back_translated_english: An implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of people who are at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by quickly delivering an electric shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.

original_english: Greater respect for the complexities of female sexual functioning has led them to conclude that suboptimal female genitalia may not be inherently better than suboptimal male genitalia, even if the reconstruction is "easier."In addition, other factors may be more important in gender satisfaction than functioning external genitals.
translated_spanish: Un mayor respeto por la complejidad de la función sexual femenina los ha llevado a concluir que las genitalias femeninas subóptimas no son inherentemente mejores que las masculinas subóptimas, incluso si la reconstrucción es 'más fácil'. Además, otros factores pueden ser más importantes para la satisfacción de género que el funcionamiento de los genitales externos.
back_translated_english: A greater respect for the complexity of female sexual function has led them to conclude that suboptimal female genitalia are not inherently better than suboptimal male genitalia, even if reconstruction is 'easier.' Additionally, other factors may be more important for gender satisfaction than the functioning of external genitals.

original_english: Regular use -- the user misses more and more school or work; worries about losing drug source; uses drugs to "fix" negative feelings; begins to stay away from friends and family; may change friends to those who are regular users; shows increased tolerance and ability to "handle" the drug.
translated_spanish: Uso regular: el usuario falta cada vez más a la escuela o al trabajo; se preocupa por perder la fuente de drogas; usa drogas para "arreglar" sentimientos negativos; comienza a alejarse de amigos y familiares; puede cambiar de amigos a aquellos que son usuarios regulares; muestra un aumento en la tolerancia y la capacidad de "manejar" la droga.
back_translated_english: Regular use: the user misses school or work more and more frequently; is concerned about losing their drug source; uses drugs to 'fix' negative feelings; begins to distance themselves from friends and family; may change friends to those who are regular users; shows an increase in tolerance and the ability to 'handle' the drug.

original_english: Increased intracranial pressure can be due to a rise in cerebrospinal fluid pressure.It can also be due to increased pressure within the brain matter caused by a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding into the brain or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain matter itself.
translated_spanish: La presión intracraneal aumentada puede deberse a un incremento en la presión del líquido cefalorraquídeo. También puede ser causada por una mayor presión dentro de los tejidos cerebrales debido a una masa (como un tumor), sangrado en el cerebro o fluido alrededor del cerebro, o hinchazón dentro de los propios tejidos cerebrales.
back_translated_english: Increased intracranial pressure may be due to an increase in the pressure of cerebrospinal fluid. It can also be caused by increased pressure within the brain tissues due to a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding in the brain, or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain tissues themselves.

original_english: Some substances that are found to be harmful to people or animals may still be allowed, but only at the level of 1/100th of the amount that is considered harmful.People with any allergies or food intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.
translated_spanish: Algunas sustancias que se encuentran dañinas para las personas o los animales pueden seguir permitirse, pero solo a la cuarta parte del nivel considerado peligroso. Las personas con alergias o intolerancia a los alimentos deben siempre verificar la lista de ingredientes (etiqueta) por su propia protección.
back_translated_english: Some substances that are found to be harmful to people or animals may still be permitted, but only at one-fourth the level considered dangerous. People with allergies or food intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.

original_english: Not having milk in your diet can lead to a shortage of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein.You may need to find new ways to get calcium into your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need 1,000 - 1,500 mg of calcium each day):
translated_spanish: No tener leche en tu dieta puede llevar a una falta de calcio, vitamina D, riboflavina y proteínas. Puede que necesites encontrar nuevas formas de obtener calcio en tu dieta (dependiendo de tu edad y género, necesitas entre 1,000 - 1,500 mg de calcio cada día):
back_translated_english: Not having milk in your diet may lead to a deficiency of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein. You might need to find new ways to get calcium in your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need between 1,000 - 1,500 mg of calcium each day):

original_english: Because it is difficult to determine the amount of radiation exposure from nuclear accidents, the best signs of the severity of the exposure are: the length of time between the exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of symptoms, and severity of changes in white blood cells.
translated_spanish: Dado que es difícil determinar la cantidad de exposición a radiación en caso de accidentes nucleares, los mejores indicadores de la gravedad de la exposición son: el tiempo entre la exposición y el inicio de los síntomas, la severidad de los síntomas y la gravedad de los cambios en las células blancas del sangre.
back_translated_english: Given that it is difficult to determine the amount of radiation exposure in cases of nuclear accidents, the best indicators of the severity of the exposure are: the time between the exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of the symptoms, and the seriousness of changes in white blood cells.

original_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is easier for a surgeon to make female genitalia than it is to make male genitalia), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.
translated_spanish: Nota: A menudo es técnicamente más fácil tratar (y por lo tanto criar) al niño como femenino (es más fácil para un cirujano crear genitales femeninos que masculinos), por lo que en algunos casos se recomienda esto incluso si el niño es genéticamente masculino.
back_translated_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is easier for a surgeon to create female genitalia than male), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.

original_english: Deficiency happens more often in women than in men, and is more common in pregnant women and older children. Getting enough iodine in the diet may prevent a form of physical and mental retardation called cretinism.Cretinism is very rare in the U.S. because iodine deficiency is generally not a problem.
translated_spanish: La deficiencia ocurre con más frecuencia en mujeres que en hombres, y es más común en mujeres embarazadas y en niños mayores. Obtener suficiente yodo en la dieta puede prevenir una forma de retraso físico e intelectual llamada cretinismo. El cretinismo es muy raro en los EE.UU. porque la deficiencia de yodo no suele ser un problema.
back_translated_english: The deficiency occurs more frequently in women than in men, and it is more common in pregnant women and older children. Getting enough iodine in the diet can prevent a form of physical and intellectual retardation called cretinism. Cretinism is very rare in the U.S. because iodine deficiency is not usually an issue.

original_english: People who have a sudden herniated disk caused by injury (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will get nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medications (NSAIDs) and narcotic painkillers if they have severe pain in the back and leg.If you have back spasms, you will usually receive muscle relaxants.
translated_spanish: Las personas que tienen una hernia de disco causada repentinamente por un trauma (como un accidente de carro o levantar un objeto muy pesado) recibirán medicamentos antiinflamatorios no esteroideos (AINEs) y analgésicos narcóticos si tienen dolor severo en la espalda y la pierna. Si tiene espasmos musculares en la espalda, generalmente recibirá relajantes musculares.
back_translated_english: People who have a disk herniation caused suddenly by trauma (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will receive nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and narcotic analgesics if they experience severe back and leg pain. If they have muscle spasms in the back, they are generally given muscle relaxants.

original_english: Threre is a wide range for what is considered "normal." Just because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (meaning 85 out of 100 children weigh more), this number rarely means your child is sick, you're not feeding your child enough, or your breast milk is not enough for your baby.
translated_spanish: Hay una amplia gama de lo que se considera 'normal'. Simplemente porque su hijo esté en el percentil 15 para el peso (lo que significa que 85 de cada 100 niños pesan más), este número rara vez significa que su hijo está enfermo, no le está dando suficiente alimento o que su leche materna no es suficiente para su bebé.
back_translated_english: There is a wide range of what is considered 'normal'. Simply because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (which means that 85 out of every 100 children weigh more), this number rarely means that your child is sick, not getting enough food, or that your breast milk isn't sufficient for your baby.

original_english: Congenital heart surgery; Patent ductus arteriosus ligation; Hypoplastic left heart repair; Tetralogy of Fallot repair; Coarctation of the aorta repair; Atrial septal defect repair; Ventricular septal defect repair; Truncus arteriosus repair; Total anomalous pulmonary artery correction; Transposition of great vessels repair; Tricuspid atresia repair; VSD repair; ASD repair; PDA ligation
translated_spanish: Cirugía cardíaca congénita; Ligadura del ductus arterioso persistente (PDA); Reparación de corazón izquierdo hipoplásico; Reparación de tetralogía de Fallot; Reparación de coartación de aorta; Reparación de comunicación interauricular (CIA); Reparación de comunicación interventricular (CIV); Reparación de trunco arterioso; Corrección de anomalía pulmonar persistente; Reparación de transposición de grandes vasos; Reparación de atresia tricuspídea; Reparación de CIV (VSD); Reparación de CIA (ASD); Ligadura de PDA
back_translated_english: Congenital heart surgery; Ligation of persistent ductus arteriosus (PDA); Repair of hypoplastic left heart syndrome; Repair of Tetralogy of Fallot; Repair of coarctation of the aorta; Repair of atrial septal defect (ASD); Repair of ventricular septal defect (VSD); Repair of truncus arteriosus; Correction of persistent pulmonary hypertension; Repair of transposition of great arteries; Repair of tricuspid atresia; VSD repair; ASD repair; PDA ligation

original_english: This test is done during a hospital stay.  It tells the difference between someone who is making urine because of drinking a lot of liquid and someone who is not.  If you have central diabetes insipidus, you will still make a lot of urine even when fluids are not given.
translated_spanish: Se realiza este examen durante una estadía hospitalaria. Permite distinguir entre alguien que produce orina debido a la ingesta de grandes cantidades de líquidos y alguien que no lo hace. Si usted padece diabetes insípida central, seguirá produciendo mucha orina incluso cuando no se le proporcionan líquidos.
back_translated_english: This test is performed during a hospital stay. It helps distinguish between someone who produces urine due to the intake of large quantities of fluids and someone who does not. If you suffer from central diabetes insipidus, you will continue to produce a lot of urine even when no liquids are provided.

original_english: Also, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are marked "enriched." It is healthiest to get carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in as natural a form as possible -- for example, from fruit instead of table sugar.
translated_spanish: Además, muchos alimentos refinados, como la harina blanca, el azúcar y el arroz blanco, carecen de vitaminas del complejo B y otras importantes sustancias nutritivas a menos que estén marcados con "enriquecido". Es más saludable obtener carbohidratos, vitaminas y otras sustancias nutritivas en la forma más natural posible -- por ejemplo, de las frutas en lugar del azúcar refinado.
back_translated_english: Moreover, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B-complex vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are labeled 'enriched.' It is healthier to obtain carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in the most natural form possible -- for example, from fruits rather than refined sugar.

original_english: The pituitary gland near the brain makes too much of the hormone ACTH (called Cushing's disease), which may happen with too much growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor of the pituitary gland, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH
translated_spanish: La glándula pituitaria cerca del cerebro produce demasiada hormona corticotropina (llamado enfermedad de Cushing), lo cual puede ocurrir con un crecimiento excesivo de la glándula pituitaria, un tumor en la glándula pituitaria o un tumor en alguna otra parte del cuerpo (como el páncreas, el pulmón y la tiroides) que produce ACTH.
back_translated_english: The pituitary gland near the brain is producing too much corticotropin hormone (called Cushing's disease), which can occur due to excessive growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor in the pituitary gland, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH.

original_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally best to assign a gender as quickly as possible, often based on the external genitals rather than the chromosomal gender, and to instruct the parents to have no ambiguity in their minds as to the gender of the child.
translated_spanish: En el pasado, la opinión predominante era que generalmente lo mejor era asignar un género tan pronto como fuera posible, a menudo basándose en los genitales externos más que en el género cromosómico, e instruir a los padres para que no tuvieran ninguna ambigüedad en su mente sobre el género del niño.
back_translated_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally best to assign a gender as soon as possible, often based on external genitalia rather than chromosomal sex, and to instruct parents not to have any ambiguity in their minds about their child's gender.

original_english: Daily preoccupation -- the user loses any motivation; does not care about school and work; has obvious behavior changes; thinking about drug use is more important than all other interests, including relationships; the user becomes secretive; may begin dealing drugs to help support habit; use of other, harder drugs may increase; legal problems may increase.
translated_spanish: Preocupación diaria -- el usuario pierde toda motivación; no le importa la escuela y el trabajo; tiene cambios obvios en el comportamiento; pensar sobre el consumo de drogas es más importante que todos los demás intereses, incluidas las relaciones; el usuario se vuelve secreto; puede comenzar a traficar con drogas para ayudar a sostener su hábito; el uso de otras drogas más duras puede aumentar; los problemas legales pueden incrementarse.
back_translated_english: Daily concern -- the user loses all motivation; does not care about school and work; shows obvious changes in behavior; thinking about drug use is more important than any other interests, including relationships; the user becomes secretive; may start dealing drugs to help support their habit; use of harder drugs may increase; legal problems may escalate.

original_english: You have sudden, sharp chest pain with shortness of breath, especially after a long trip, a stretch of bedrest (for example, following an operation), or other lack of movement, especially if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be a blood clot, part of which has moved to the lungs).
translated_spanish: Tiene dolor torácico súbito e intenso con dificultad para respirar, especialmente después de un viaje largo, una estancia prolongada en cama (por ejemplo, después de una cirugía) o otra falta de movimiento, sobre todo si una pierna está hinchada o más hinchada que la otra (esto podría ser un coágulo de sangre, parte del cual se ha movido a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: You have sudden and intense chest pain with difficulty breathing, especially after a long trip, prolonged bed rest (for example, after surgery), or other lack of movement, particularly if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be blood clots that have moved to your lungs).

original_english: The mother may fake symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or stool, withholding food, falsifying fevers, secretly giving the child drugs to make the child throw up or have diarrhea, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous (given through a vein) lines to make the child appear or become ill.
translated_spanish: La madre puede fingir síntomas de enfermedad en su hijo añadiendo sangre a la orina o heces del niño, privándolo de alimentos, falsificando fiebres, administrándole secretamente medicamentos para provocar vómitos o diarrea al niño, o utilizando otros trucos, como infectar líneas intravenosas (dadas a través de una vena) para hacer que el niño parezca enfermo o se vuelva realmente enfermo.
back_translated_english: The mother may pretend that her child is ill by adding blood to the child's urine or feces, depriving the child of food, falsifying fevers, secretly administering medications to induce vomiting or diarrhea in the child, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous lines (given through a vein) to make the child appear sick or actually become ill.

original_english: Because there is little or no flow out of the left heart, blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (a hole connecting the collecting chambers on the left and right sides of the heart) back to the right side of the heart.
translated_spanish: Dado que hay muy poco o ningún flujo desde el lado izquierdo del corazón, la sangre que regresa al corazón desde los pulmones necesita pasar a través del foramen ovalo o una comunicación interauricular (un orificio que conecta las cámaras de recogida en los lados derecho e izquierdo del corazón) de vuelta al lado derecho del corazón.
back_translated_english: Given that there is very little or no flow from the left side of the heart, blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the patent foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (an opening connecting the collecting chambers on the right and left sides of the heart) back to the right side of the heart.

original_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these tips:Try to place the tooth back in the mouth where it fell out, so it is level with other teeth. Bite down gently on gauze or a wet tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.
translated_spanish: Puede llevar el diente al dentista siguiendo uno de estos consejos:Intente colocar el diente en la boca donde salió, de manera que quede a nivel con los demás dientes. Muerda suavemente sobre gasas o un paquete de té húmedo para ayudarlo a mantenerse en su lugar. Tenga cuidado de no tragar el diente.
back_translated_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these suggestions: Try to place the tooth back in the socket where it came out, so that it is level with the other teeth. Bite gently on gauze or a wet tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.

original_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only the other person." "It" may represent becoming pregnant or catching a sexually-transmitted disease after having unprotected sex, causing a car crash while driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or any of the many other negative effects of risk-taking behaviors.
translated_spanish: Otro mito de la adolescencia es la idea de que 'nunca me va a pasar a mí, solo al otro'. Esto puede representar quedar embarazado o contraer una enfermedad sexualmente transmisibles después del sexo sin protección, causar un accidente de tráfico mientras se conduce bajo los efectos del alcohol u otras drogas, o cualquier otra de las numerosas consecuencias negativas de comportamientos arriesgados.
back_translated_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that 'it will never happen to me, only to others.' This can represent becoming pregnant or contracting a sexually transmitted disease after unprotected sex, causing a traffic accident while driving under the influence of alcohol or other drugs, or any other of the numerous negative consequences of risky behaviors.

original_english: It is important to have the teeth cleaned thoroughly.This may involve use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper flossing and brushing is always needed, even after professional tooth cleaning, to reduce your risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and floss properly.
translated_spanish: Es importante que se realice una limpieza dental completa. Esto puede implicar el uso de diversas herramientas para despegar y eliminar la placa y la sarro de los dientes. El enjuague con hilo dental y cepillado adecuados siempre son necesarios, incluso después de un tratamiento profesional de limpieza dental, para reducir su riesgo de enfermedad periodontal. Su dentista o higienista dental le mostrará cómo realizar correctamente el enjuague con hilo dental y el cepillado.
back_translated_english: It is important to have a complete dental cleaning. This may involve the use of various tools to remove plaque and tartar from your teeth. Proper flossing and brushing are always necessary, even after professional dental cleaning treatment, to reduce your risk of periodontal disease. Your dentist or dental hygienist will show you how to perform proper flossing and brushing.

original_english: How well you do depends on the amount of poison swallowed and how quickly treatment is received.
translated_spanish: Su pronóstico depende de la cantidad de veneno ingerido y de cuán rápidamente se recibe el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: Their prognosis depends on the amount of poison ingested and how quickly treatment is received.

original_english: Rarely, children will have problems falling asleep or staying asleep.
translated_spanish: En raras ocasiones, los niños tendrán problemas para conciliar el sueño o mantenerse dormidos.
back_translated_english: In rare cases, children will have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep.

original_english: Reye syndrome can occur when aspirin is used to treat children with viral infections, such as chickenpox or the flu.
translated_spanish: El síndrome de Reye puede ocurrir cuando se utiliza el ácido acetilsalicílico (aspirin) para tratar a los niños con infecciones virales, como la varicela o la influenza.
back_translated_english: Reye's syndrome may occur when acetylsalicylic acid (aspirin) is used to treat children with viral infections such as chickenpox or the flu.

original_english: Bili lights is a type of light therapy (phototherapy) that is used to treat newborn jaundice . Jaundice is a yellow coloring of the skin and eyes caused by too much of a substance called bilirubin.
translated_spanish: Las luces de bili es un tipo de terapia con luz (fototerapia) que se utiliza para tratar la ictericia en recién nacidos. La ictericia es una coloración amarillenta de la piel y los ojos causada por demasiado de un compuesto llamado bilirrubina.
back_translated_english: Bili lights are a type of light therapy (phototherapy) used to treat jaundice in newborns. Jaundice is a yellowish discoloration of the skin and eyes caused by too much of a compound called bilirubin.

original_english: Surgery combined with radiation therapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high chance of returning, has spread to the lymph nodes, or is a grade 2 or 3.
translated_spanish: La cirugía combinada con radioterapia se utiliza a menudo para tratar a las mujeres con enfermedad de etapa 1 que tiene una alta probabilidad de reaparecer, que se ha propagado a los ganglios linfáticos o que es grado 2 o 3.
back_translated_english: Combined surgery with radiation therapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high likelihood of recurrence, that has spread to the lymph nodes, or that is grade 2 or 3.
